text: Erol Kolcu (born 20 April 1962) is a retired Turkish football defender and later manager. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:Samsunspor footballers Category:Sakaryaspor footballers Category:Mersin İdman Yurdu footballers Category:Alanyaspor footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Turkish football managers Category:Sakaryaspor managers
title: Erol Kolcu
